svg: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 300"><rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="300" fill="#f0f0f0"/><line x1="50" y1="250" x2="50" y2="50" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="50" y1="250" x2="350" y2="250" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="75" y="100" width="50" height="150" fill="#4CAF50"/><rect x="150" y="150" width="50" height="100" fill="#2196F3"/><rect x="225" y="50" width="50" height="200" fill="#FFC107"/><rect x="300" y="200" width="50" height="50" fill="#FF5722"/><text x="100" y="270" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Product A</text><text x="175" y="270" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Product B</text><text x="250" y="270" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Product C</text><text x="325" y="270" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Product D</text><text x="45" y="255" text-anchor="end" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">0</text><text x="45" y="205" text-anchor="end" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">25</text><text x="45" y="155" text-anchor="end" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">50</text><text x="45" y="105" text-anchor="end" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">75</text><text x="45" y="55" text-anchor="end" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">100</text><text x="200" y="30" text-anchor="middle" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold">Product Sales Comparison</text></svg>
